title: Budget balance in Greece 2024
summary: In general Budget balance in billion euros has rose over the Year.
Budget balance in billion euros is roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019, gradually increasing from 2019 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2024.
The line drastically increased by 3.3 times from Year 2019 to 2020.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2019 and 2020.
The highest Budget balance in billion euros, of value 3.59 was reached at Year 2024
The lowest Budget balance in billion euros, of value 0.59 was reported at Year 2019
